verbs.description: [V: Remember] [ARG1: the news conference last January when Jackson applied the marinade] ? He left Trump sopping wet .
Remember the news conference [ARGM-TMP: last January] [R-ARGM-TMP: when] [ARG0: Jackson] [V: applied] [ARG1: the marinade] ? He left Trump sopping wet .
Remember the news conference last January when Jackson applied the marinade ? [ARG0: He] [V: left] [ARG1: Trump] [ARG2: sopping wet] .
